record.description: Joint U.S./U.S.S.R. Symposium on Transport of Ions Across Membranes, Center for Continuing Education, U. of C., June 21-25, 1976. Left to right: Yuri A. Ovchinnikov, co-organizer of the meeting (with Dr. Daniel C. Tosteson, Vice President for the Medical Center, U of C), from Shemyakin Institute of Bio-organic Chemistry, USSR Academy of Sciences, Moscow, (glasses). B. Gisin, Department of Chemistry, Rockefeller University, (back to camera). Peter Lauger, University of Konstanz, Germany (glasses, right).
record.subject4: Center for Continuing Education (University of Chicago)
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
